price: Qubannaaf sanatu caala moo, (muka hadhaawaa) zaqquumtu caala?
arabic: أَذَٰلِكَ خَيۡرٞ نُّزُلًا أَمۡ شَجَرَةُ ٱلزَّقُّومِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: adhālika khayrun nuzulan am shajaratu al-zaqūmi
